CustomField.description:
ETL status for JDE/Fiesso(SAP Shoes)/MyPR
"V" : Validated (for Perso orders only). Pending orders to wait 3 days as the client can cancel his order. "STOCK": Perso Order ready to be sent to MyPR (after V status) "S" : Perso order (Souliers product) ready to be sent to SAP Fiesso (after V status)
ETL execution in 3 steps for JDE: Batch creation => Order creation => Purchase creation "A": Order ready to be sent to JDE (when Opportunity.stageName becomes 'Creation in progress' for SPO or 3 days after creation for Perso orders) "B": ETL return: Batch creation failure "C": ETL return: Batch created with success "D": ETL return: Order creation failure "E": ETL return: Order created with success "F": ETL return: Purchase creation failure "I": incorrect/incomplete order for JDE "Y": ETL Success (creation in success for JDE / Fiesso / MyPR) "PAP_ART": ETL return: Order article sent to SAP "PAP_ARTE": ETL return: Sending of article to SAP failed
CustomField.label: ETL Status

value.label: Order ready to be sent to JDE and SAP FMS
ETL/JDE: Sale order created with success
Perso order ready to be sent to MyPR
S - Perso order (Shoes) ready to be sent to SAP Fiesso
LG_SOE Error during export to SAP FMS
J - SKU does not exist on SPP
LG_SO - Printing order sent to SAP FMS
